1707.name: NOT_CONNECT_USB
1707.message:
Unable to find a Wii LAN Adapter.

Make sure the Wii LAN Adapter is
securely connected.
1707.short_description: The console could not detect a Wii LAN Adapter.
1707.long_description: (WII LAN ADAPTER) The console could not detect a Wii LAN Adapter. It may not be connected correctly or have an incompatible chipset. There may also be a problem with the adapter or the USB port on the console, Ethernet port on the adapter or network device.
1707.short_solution: Ensure that the Wii LAN Adapter is correctly connected to the console and network device.
1707.long_solution: Ensure that the Wii LAN Adapter is correctly connected to the console and network device. If the LAN adapter isn't a Wii or Nintendo Switch LAN Adapter, ensure that it has the correct chipset that is compatible with Wii U consoles (ASIX AX88772 or AX88772A). Ensure that USB port on the console and the USB adapter isn't damaged, worn or dirty, as well as for the Ethernet cable and Ethernet port on the adapter and network device.
